/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++    -framework OpenGL -D__APPLE__ -g -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/OpenGL_Learn.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenGL_Learn.dir/Shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenGL_Learn.dir/opengl.cpp.o  -o OpenGL_Learn -lGLEW -lglfw
